system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal

Effect: The user may freely move up to the Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack. This attack ignores [Defensive] Abilities and effects of valid targets. If this attack deals super effective damage to a target, that target is Flinched.

Requirement: [Koraidon] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Collision Course on the user's Active List.

.

actions.name: Catastrophic Paradox Meteor

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.
